'''''Amon Hen'' 212''' is the two-hundred-and-twelfth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[July]] [[2008]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[Lothlórien]]
** By: Sue Wookey
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]

* Artwork: Border
** By: Susanne Stopfel
* [[Bywater]] Announcements
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Announcements
* [[Oxonmoot]] Announcement
* Artwork: ''Boating [[Hobbits]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* 2012/Return of the King Announcement
* Report: 4th Jubilee of the [[Forodrim]]
** By: Susan Frances Edwards
* [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Grumpy Old Men
** By: Patricia Medway
* Poem: ''Death of [[Isildur]]''
** By: Sean Lyons
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: [[Sally Kennett]]
* Best wishes from [[Thorin and Company]]
** By: Marco di Noia
* Review: ''[[The History of The Hobbit|The History of the Hobbit]]''
** By: Mike Foster
* Review: ''[http://www.lotrplaza.com/ The Lord of the Rings Fanatics Plaza]
** By: [[David Doughan]]
* Artwork: ''[[Thranduil]]'s Palace''
** By: Nick Done
* Letters
* Artwork: ''[[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]]'s Dream''
** By: Jef Murray
* [[Mathoms|Mathom]]

* Sally's Snippets
